name: Coding Club
description: The Coding Club is a community of tech enthusiasts passionate about programming, software development, and emerging technologies. We organize hackathons, coding workshops, and guest lectures to help students sharpen their technical skills and collaborate on innovative projects.

name: Robotics Club
description: The Robotics Club focuses on designing, building, and programming autonomous robots. Members get hands-on experience with Arduino, Raspberry Pi, and various sensors. We participate in national and international robotics competitions.

name: Literature Club
description: The Literature Club is a haven for book lovers, writers, and poets. We conduct book reading sessions, poetry slams, and creative writing workshops. It is a space where students can express themselves through words.

name: Photography Club
description: The Photography Club captures the vibrant life on campus. We organize photo walks, editing workshops, and exhibitions. Members learn about composition, lighting, and post-processing techniques.
